testSteps.description: User is searching for a contact and typing a message in the chat to send it

assertions.text: Send message button should be visible

evidence.description: Green send button is visible on the right side of the message input area, next to the text 'Hello' being typed
Send button remains visible with green background and white arrow icon while user types 'Hello test message'
Send button visible in the chat interface after message 'Hello test message!' has been sent, confirming its consistent presence

assertions.explanation: A send message button (green circular button with a white send icon) is clearly visible in the chat interface throughout the recording. The button appears in frames showing the 'Me' conversation thread, positioned in the bottom-right corner of the screen next to the text input field.
